page.title: 03Community Aspects/The Arts
page.content: Altogether there are{62}activities which take place in the Market Bosworth community and{25}in Barlestone.Activities are available to suit all ages and interests. To celebrate the quincentenary of the Battle of Bosworth,Mr. Barrett from Mkt. Bosworth,put on a musical comedy called '{1485}and all that '.Also a concert called 'Ancestral Voices', written by and performed by local people,was shown.The Prince and Princess of Wales visited the site of the Battle on the{27}June '85.The school is a Community Centre offering many activities.To find most of our information we interviewed Kate Thorpe the Mkt. Bosworth painter who as well as being on the Community Management Committee,also sells her paintings and drawings.
